com.github.rolecraftdev.data

Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.rolecraftdev.data.DataManager

  • public final class DataManager
extends Object
    Manages data objects, such as PlayerData objects, in Rolecraft

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CONFIRM_COMMAND_METADATA 

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a new DataManager object

      PlayerData getPlayerData(UUID player)
      Gets the PlayerData object for the player with the given unique identifier (UUID)

      DataStore getStore()
      Gets the DataStore being used to store and retrieve data for this DataManager
      void loadOrCreateData(UUID player)
      Loads data for the given player from the database.
      void unloadAllPlayerData()
      Unloads all currently loaded PlayerData objects which are stored by this DataManager

      Unloads data for the given player and saves it to the database

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataManager

        public DataManager(RolecraftCore plugin)
        Creates a new DataManager object
        Parameters:
        plugin - The Rolecraft plugin this DataManager is storing data for

    • Method Detail

      • loadOrCreateData

        public void loadOrCreateData(UUID player)
        Loads data for the given player from the database. If no data exists for the player, a new set of data is created
        Parameters:
        player - The unique identifier of the player to load data for

      • unloadAndSaveData

        public void unloadAndSaveData(UUID player)
        Unloads data for the given player and saves it to the database
        Parameters:
        player - The unique identifier of the player to save data for

      • unloadAllPlayerData

        public void unloadAllPlayerData()
        Unloads all currently loaded PlayerData objects which are stored by this DataManager

      • getPlayerData

        public PlayerData getPlayerData(UUID player)
        Gets the PlayerData object for the player with the given unique identifier (UUID)
        Parameters:
        player - The unique identifier of the player to get data for
        Returns:
        The PlayerData for the player with the given identifier

      • getPlugin

        public RolecraftCore getPlugin()

      • getStore

        public DataStore getStore()
        Gets the DataStore being used to store and retrieve data for this DataManager
        Returns:
        This DataManager's DataStore object
